original_text: And leaving Nazareth, he came and dwelt in Capernaum, which is upon the sea coast, in the borders of Zabulon and Nephthalim:
korean_text: 나사렛을 떠나 스불론과 납달리 지경 해변에 있는 가버나움에 가서 사시니

sentences.original_text: he came and dwelt in Capernaum
which is upon the sea coast
in the borders of Zabulon and Nephthalim
